That's a violation of the practice.
Now, I'd like to tell my teacher and relatives.
"I confess and repent.
I'll never dare to do it again.
May the teacher remember me." (He said three times.)
The nun replied, "Rebuke your own mind.
'You should become disillusioned with them.' (She replied).
"So... (If you weren't two teachers...)
You should call them elder sister.'
Or...
aunt).
